editions.flavor: The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The vermillion bird blazes a fiery trail across the horizon, alight with a passion for knowledge.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.

flavor: Smoldering flames burn bright from within the soul, sparking a hunger for insight and destruction.

editions.flavor: "Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze."
Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze.
"Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze."

effect: **On Enter:** If you don't control a Fatestone regalia, reveal all cards in your material deck. Then put a Fatestone regalia card with the lowest memory cost from among them onto the field.
effect_raw: On Enter: If you don't control a Fatestone regalia, reveal all cards in your material deck. Then put a Fatestone regalia card with the lowest memory cost from among them onto the field.
name: Guo Jia, Chosen Disciple

result_editions.flavor: Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze.

rule.description: Guo Jia's on enter trigger puts a regalia directly onto the field. This does not count as a materlization, and ignores needing to pay cost and checking elemental requirements.

effect_html: On Enter: If you don't control a Fatestone regalia, reveal all cards in your material deck. Then put a Fatestone regalia card with the lowest memory cost from among them onto the field.

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk." — Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish CARDNAME. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa
name: Life Essence Amulet

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay (2) for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.
effect_raw: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay (2) for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.
flavor: If profits are to be made, bring enough to share.
name: Tariff Ring

result_editions.flavor: The Mandate of Heaven stops even steel.

rule.description: The (2) in Tariff Ring's attack condition is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

effect_html: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 2for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.

effect:
**On Enter**: Draw a card.

[Class Bonus] [REST]: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 [POWER] and gains **true sight** until end of turn. *(Units with **true sight** can attack units with **stealth**. Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw:
On Enter: Draw a card.

[Class Bonus] REST: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 POWER and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth. Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
name: Band of Burning Verdict
effect_html: On Enter: Draw a card.Class Bonus : Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth. Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

editions.effect:
**%Immortal%Immortality%**, **Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card at random from your memory. If you do, draw a card.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you banish a card from your memory, put a **quest** counter on your champion. 

[REST]: You may remove ten **quest** counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform CARDNAME.
editions.effect_raw:
Immortality, Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card at random from your memory. If you do, draw a card.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you banish a card from your memory, put a quest counter on your champion. 

REST: You may remove ten quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

other_orientations.effect:
**Spellshroud**, **Taunt**

[Guo Jia Bonus] **On Attack:** Choose one— 
 • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements.
 • **Empower X**+2, where **X** is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.
other_orientations.effect_raw:
Spellshroud, Taunt

[Guo Jia Bonus] On Attack: Choose one— 
 • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements.
 • Empower X+2, where X is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.
other_orientations.name: Seiryuu, Azure Dragon
other_orientations.effect_html: Spellshroud, TauntGuo Jia Bonus On Attack: Choose one— • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements. • Empower X+2, where X is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.

rule.description: The quest counter ability only triggers if the controller is the one banishing a card from their memory. It doesn't trigger if a different player banishes a card from it. For example, the quest counter ability will not trigger from an opponent resolving a Chilling Touch against a player that controls Fabled Azurite Fatestone.
If a transformed double-faced object would enter the graveyard from the field, it goes to the default location that the front would go. In this case, a regalia goes to its owner's banishment.

If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

effect:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.

At the beginning of your recollection phase, if you are the player with the least **influence**, draw a card. *(A player's **influence** is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)*
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.

At the beginning of your recollection phase, if you are the player with the least influence, draw a card. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)
name: Incandescent Reliquary

rule.description: If you are a player tied for the least influence with one or more other players, the ability will still trigger and resolve.

effect_html: Class Bonus This card costs 1 less to materialize.At the beginning of your recollection phase, if you are the player with the least influence, draw a card. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)

effect:
**Fast Activation** *(You may activate this card at fast speed.)*

[Guo Jia Bonus] (4): Transform CARDNAME.

effect:
[Guo Jia Bonus] Put target Fatestone card from your banishment onto the field. If that card is a regalia, put five **quest** counters on your champion.

effect:
**On Enter**: Destroy target non-champion object with memory cost 1 or less, or reserve cost 5 or less.

[Guo Jia Bonus] (3): Reveal all cards in your memory. If three or more luxem element cards were revealed this way, transform CARDNAME. Activate this ability only once per turn and at slow speed.
